Title: Choosing a Husband
Actors: Florence Barker, Mack Sennett, Billy Quirk
Plot: Four bachelors all want to marry Gladys. To test their fidelity she pretends to be away, and when they come to visit, each in turn is met by her pretty younger sister. One by one they fail the test by flirting with the sister. Gladys renounces them, then is reunited with her real sweetheart, who has been abroad.
